origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'TeslaAPI.analyze_advanced_manufacturing_investment', 'description': 'This function analyzes the allocation of capital expenditures in advanced manufacturing technologies such as automation production lines and robotics.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'capital_expenditures', 'type': 'JSON', 'description': 'The capital expenditures data in JSON format.'}, {'name': 'technology_types', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of technology types to analyze, e.g., automation_production_line, robotics.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_result', 'description': 'The analysis result of the capital expenditures allocation in advanced manufacturing technologies.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
然后，分析这些支出在先进制造技术（如自动化生产线和机器人技术）上的分配比例。
